item.title: Neatlights
item.description: The Gist of It In the config/config.py file, set up appropriate info for the redis pubsub instance you want to listen on. Posting a json blob/python dictionary on the specified channel will result in the listening thread parsing the message, and configuring the LED strand as specified. Examples can be found in config/blink_patterns.py. When passing colors into the message, use the CSS3 color names: [‘black’, ‘red’, ‘cornflowerblue’, ‘paleturquoise’].
